dmca.title: Urgent abuse removal request
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

 

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the
Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

 

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your
claim.

 

Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/index.html?p=copyright.

 

Legal Response Team

THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.


________________________________

From: Geoff Barker [mailto:geoff@bessiebardot.com] 
Sent: Friday, January 05, 2007 12:15 AM
To: Copyright
Subject: Urgent abuse removal request



Dear Sir

 

It is with some urgency that I bring to your attention the copyright
infringement on the website hosted by THEPLANET - www.bessiebardot.net
<http://www.bessiebardot.net/> 

 

I have faxed written documentation to your office in accordance with the
instructions given to me by your copyright abuse department

 

I request the urgent removal of the pictures in question ASAP 

 

The images on this site were stolen from MS Bardots computer, the theft
of which is subject to investigation by the police here in Australia

 

The webmaster has NO proof the models are over 18

The webmaster does in NO way have permission to use these illegally
stolen copyright images

Neither the photographer or the 2 models in the images have given
permission for the public display of these stolen images.

 

 

Thank you for you urgent attentinon

 

Geoff Barker

Manager / Photographer of Bessie Bardot

geoff@bessiebardot.com

+61 2 9331 3545

+61 419 996 996
